00021 struct NU_TASK_STRUCT;

00023 typedef NU_TASK_STRUCT* ThreadId;

00025 class Thread {
00026     public:
00027         enum PriorityLevel {
00028             PriorityBackground5 = APOXI_THREAD_PRIORITY_NORMAL + 5, 
00029             PriorityBackground4 = APOXI_THREAD_PRIORITY_NORMAL + 4,
00030             PriorityBackground3 = APOXI_THREAD_PRIORITY_NORMAL + 3,
00031             PriorityBackground2 = APOXI_THREAD_PRIORITY_NORMAL + 2,
00032             PriorityBackground1 = APOXI_THREAD_PRIORITY_NORMAL + 1,
00033             PriorityNormal      = APOXI_THREAD_PRIORITY_NORMAL,     
00034             PriorityForeground1 = APOXI_THREAD_PRIORITY_NORMAL - 1,
00035             PriorityForeground2 = APOXI_THREAD_PRIORITY_NORMAL - 2,
00036             PriorityForeground3 = APOXI_THREAD_PRIORITY_NORMAL - 3,
00037             PriorityForeground4 = APOXI_THREAD_PRIORITY_NORMAL - 4,
00038             PriorityForeground5 = APOXI_THREAD_PRIORITY_NORMAL - 5, 
00039         };
00040         
00041         Thread();
00042         virtual ~Thread();
00043 
00044         void SetRequestedStackSize(UINT32 size);
00045         UINT32 GetRequestedStackSize() { return m_requested_stacksize; }
00046 
00047         BOOLEAN Run(UINT32 stacksize = 0, void *stack = 0);
00048 
00049         virtual INT ThreadFn() = 0;
00050 
00051         INT GetPriority() const { return m_priority; }
00052         BOOLEAN SetPriority(INT priority);
00053 
00054         BOOLEAN IncreasePriority();
00055         BOOLEAN DecreasePriority();
00056 
00057         void SetName(const CHAR* name);
00058         const CHAR* GetName() const { return m_name; };
00059 
00060         INT Suspend() const;
00061         INT Resume() const;
00062         INT Yield() const;
00063 
00064         BOOLEAN Terminate(INT exit_code = 0);
00065 
00066         static ThreadId GetThreadId();
00067         static void SetThreadData(void *data);
00068         static void* GetThreadData();
00069 
00070     private:
00071         friend class Os;
00072         
00073         enum Status {
00074             THREAD_INVALID,
00075             THREAD_RUNNING,
00076             THREAD_SUSPENDED,
00077             THREAD_TERMINATED
00078         };
00079 
00080         mutable Status m_status;
00081         INT m_priority;
00082         UINT32 m_requested_stacksize;
00083         StackAtom* m_stack;
00084         CHAR m_name[c_max_thread_name_length];
00085

00093         static BOOLEAN m_sem_initialized;
